mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board (num, root, title, content, writer) VALUES (qna_board_seq.NEXTVAL, qna_board_seq.CURRVAL, #{title }, #{content }, #{writer })
mapper.update: UPDATE qna_board SET readcnt = readcnt + 1 WHERE num=#{num}
UPDATE qna_board SET title = #{title }, content = #{content } WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM no, q.*, (SELECT name FROM member m WHERE m.id = writer) name FROM (SELECT * FROM qna_board ORDER BY root, step DESC) q ORDER BY num DESC) q WHERE num BETWEEN #{beginList } and #{endList }
